title: Over mij
text:
Hey, I'm Frank! About two and a half years ago I dove headfirst into front-end development at Leads.io. I started out with CRO work, which was the perfect playground for sharpening my CSS and JavaScript skills. Before long, I was building Vue components and crafting full CRO templates.

After a year and a half, I took the leap and went freelance. These days I spend my time building websites from the ground up with Nuxt. E-commerce, storytelling sites, business pages, funnels, and CMS integrations. Going solo has been a game-changer for my growth, and the side projects I've taken on have taught me more than I could've imagined.

Here's what I bring to the table:

  • Turning Figma designs into pixel-perfect code
  • Building complete websites with CMS integration
  • Developing with accessibility in mind
  • State management
  • API handling
  • Performance optimization
  • SEO optimization
